title: ReBeirut
content:
Previously:   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/69018.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110153823/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/69018.html)   
   
So I took some pictures, most of them too lousy to show,   
but most of the rest can be found here, avec captions:   
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/48413419](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110153823/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/48413419)@N00/sets/279430/   
(Copy-paste that whole thing.)   
   
BTW, Nadine, apparently the Virgin rooftop closes for the winter,   
but it _was_ open when we were there - although in the end my   
program for one was too full to make it there this time.   
   
hhp
author: hrant

I’m glad you liked my “frankenstein ist hier.” I had so much fun preparing the presentation…
